hyperlink.target: childManagementContainerOnly?managementFormType=${oldManagementFormType}&entityName=${entityName}&parentEntityName=${parentEntityName}&insertMode=N&subFolder=${subFolder}&relationTitle=${relationTitle}&screenNameListIndex=${screenNameListIndex}&folderIndex=${groovy: org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilValidate.isNotEmpty(context.get("returnFolderIndex")) ? context.get("returnFolderIndex") : context.get("folderIndex")}&contextManagement=${contextManagement}&backAreaId=${backAreaId}&${bsh: import org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilValidate;import org.ofbiz.base.util.StringUtil; return UtilValidate.isNotEmpty(context.get("managementChildExtraParams")) ? "&" + StringUtil.replaceString(context.get("managementChildExtraParams"), "|", "&") : ""}${bsh: import org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilValidate; UtilValidate.isNotEmpty(context.get("orderBy")) ? "&orderBy=" + context.get("orderBy") : (UtilValidate.isNotEmpty(parameters.get("orderBy")) ? "&orderBy=" + parameters.get("orderBy") : "")}&${arrayListExtraParams}
